mdRecord.dcterms:title: Geologic map of western Virginia, 1922 / compiled by G.W. Stose from published and manuscript maps of the U.S. Geological Survey and from the geologic map of Virginia by Thomas L. Watson, supplemented by personal knowledge ; Virginia Geological Survey, Thomas Leonard Watson, Director
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Stose, George Willis, 1869-1960
Virginia Geological Survey.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Virginia Geological Survey, Bulletin XXIII, Plate IV" -- Printed on verso.
Shows the Blue Ridge Mountains and points west.
Includes a "List of manganese mines and prospects in western Virginia."
